entries.title: How Starlink is connecting the deserts of North America
entries.description: In remote areas of the American West, Elon Musk's satellites are providing unexpected access to the internet. The company says it has about 400,000 customers in the United States.

entries.title: Europe wants its own ultra-secure satellite constellation
entries.description: Like when they created Galileo to be independent from the American GPS, the Europeans are launching Iris².
